src:
Plaz ogrožal hišo
07 Nov 2019, 19:30 by M. M.
Ob 8.15 je v naselju Armeško (občina Krško) zemeljski plaz ogrožal stanovanjsko hišo. Plazeča zemljina, ki pritiska na hišo, sega okoli pol metra v višino. Gasilci PGD Brestanica so plazišče do sanacije prekrili z zaščitno folijo. O dogodku so bile obveščene pristojne službe, poročajo dežurni v ReCO Brežice.
Ob 8.19 je bila zaradi okvare na vodovodnem sistemu motena dobava pitne vode na območju naselij Blatno, Suhadol, Mali vrh in del Curnovca v občini Brežice. Okvaro so delavci Komunale Brežice odpravili do 14.30 ure.
Ob 13.16 je v krožišču državne ceste v Boštanju obstalo okvarjeno tovorno vozilo. Ob prihodu gasilcev PGD Sevnica je motor vozila vžgal, vozilo pa je bilo pripeljano na najbližje parkirno mesto.

Delavec poškodoval roko

Ob 16.35 si je v podjetju v Krmelju delavec pri delu poškodoval roko. Posredovali so reševalci NMP Sevnica, ki so delavca na kraju ustrezno oskrbeli in prepeljali v UC Novo mesto.
Ob 7.48 so v Dobruški vasi posredovali prvi posredovalci iz PGD Škocjan in Grmovlje in nudili prvo pomoč oboleli osebi do prihoda reševalcev nujne medicinske pomoči ZD Novo mesto, pa so dodali dežurni v ReCO Novo mesto.
Ob 16.25 je bil na cesti Dolenje Ponikve—Dečja vas (občina Trebnje) opažen oljni madež. Gasilci PGD Trebnje so na dolžini osemsto metrov madež posuli z vpojnim sredstvom in očistili cestišče. Na kraju je bil delavec komunale Trebnje, ki je poskrbel za zavarovanje s cestno signalizacijo. Obveščene so bile pristojne službe.
Ob 17.25 so v naselju Groblje pri Prekopi (občina Šentjernej) padli vodniki z droga na cestišče. Gasilci PGD Groblje so odstranili vodnike, podprli drog in poskrbeli za prevoznost ceste. Dežurni delavec Telekoma Slovenije je odpravil napako na omrežju.
text:
Avalanche threatened the house
07 Nov 2019, 19:30 by M.M.
At 8.15 am, a landslide threatened a dwelling house in the village of Armeško (municipality of Krško). The creeping earth that presses on the house extends about half a meter in height. PGD Brestanica firefighters covered the site with a protective foil until it was repaired. Competent services were informed about the incident, the duty officer at ReCO Brežice reported.
At 8.19 am, the supply of drinking water in the area of the settlements Blatno, Suhadol, Mali vrh and part of Curnovec in the municipality of Brežice was disrupted due to a failure of the water supply system. The workers were eliminated by the employees of the Municipality of Brežice by 2.30 pm.
At 13.16, there was a defective truck at the roundabout of the state road in Boštanj. Upon the arrival of PGD Sevnica firefighters, the engine of the vehicle was started and the vehicle was brought to the nearest parking space.

Worker injured his arm

At 4.35pm, a worker in the Krmelj company injured his arm at work. NMP Sevnica rescuers intervened, who provided the worker with adequate care and transported him to UC Novo mesto.
At 7.48 am, the first mediators from the Skocjan and Grmovlje PGDs intervened in Dobruška vas and provided first aid to the diseased person until the arrival of emergency workers of the Novo mesto Emergency Medical Services, adding a duty officer to ReCO Novo mesto.
At 16.25 an oil stain was observed on the Dolenje Ponikve-Dečja vas (Municipality of Trebnje) road. PGD Trebnje firefighters sprayed a stain with absorbent material over a length of eight hundred meters and cleared the roadway. On the spot was a worker of the Trebnje municipal utility, who provided security with road signs. The competent services were informed.
At 17.25, guides from the drugs to the roadway fell in Groblje near Prekopi (Šentjernej municipality). PGD Cemetery firefighters removed the guides, backed up the pole and made the road accessible. A Telekom Slovenije employee on duty fixed the network error.
